This is a testharness.js-based test.
[FAIL] direction returns "none" when there is a triple click selection(directionless)
  assert_equals: expected Element node <div id="container">hello, world</div> but got Text node "hello, world"
[FAIL] direction returns "none" when the selection is collapsed
  assert_equals: expected Text node "hello, world" but got Element node <div id="container">hello, world</div>
Harness: the test ran to completion.
